document.full_text: david wright homered twice and jason pridie hit the first home run of his career as the mets' extended their win streak to four games after defeating the diamondbacks on sunday.
document.title: mets 8, diamondbacks 4: mets extend win streak to 4
lines_and_colors: david wright homered twice and jason pridie hit the first home run of his career as the mets' extended their win streak to four games after defeating the diamondbacks on sunday.
